main.name: Carlos Max Utsch Costa
main.description: Tech Lead | Software Architect | Full-stack Developer
main.bio:
Hi, I’m Carlos Max Utsch Costa — a seasoned Tech Lead and Full-stack Developer with over 8 years of experience building scalable, high-performance SaaS platforms.

I specialize in Java, Spring Boot, React, TypeScript and Python, with deep expertise in microservices, event-driven architectures and cloud-native deployments using Docker and Kubernetes.

My work focuses on leading cross-functional teams, designing robust system architectures, and integrating AI solutions to automate workflows.

Passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and system scalability, I’m always exploring new technologies to solve complex problems efficiently.
